verses.roman:
maṅgalacaṇḍī viṣahari kari' jāgaraṇa
tā'te vādya, nṛtya, gīta,--yogya ācaraṇa

synonyms: maṅgala-caṇḍī—of the religious performance for worship of Maṅgalacaṇḍī; viṣahari—of the religious performance for worship of Viṣahari; kari'-observing; jāgaraṇa—night vigil; tā'te—in that ceremony; vādya—musical performance; nṛtya—dancing; gīta—chanting; yogya—suitable; ācaraṇa—custom.
translation: " 'When we keep a nightlong vigil to observe religious performances for the worship of Maṅgalacaṇḍī and Viṣahari, playing on musical instruments, dancing and chanting are certainly fitting customs.
